channelPropertyName.title: Channel Name
channelPropertyName.description: This should be your unique name for your channel within your structure

channelPropertyType.title: Channel Type
channelPropertyType.description: This should be the type of data for this channel

channelPropertyUnit.title: Channel Unit
channelPropertyUnit.description: This should be the unit the value is in

channelPropertyValueDoubleSingle.title: Channel Value
channelPropertyValueDoubleSingle.description: This is the single value for your channel

channelPropertyValueDoubleMinMaxMeanSTD.title: Channel Value
channelPropertyValueDoubleMinMaxMeanSTD.description: This is the minimum, maximum, mean and standard deviation value for your channel over the observed period

min.title: Minimum Channel Value
min.description: The minimum channel value over the observed period

max.title: Maximum Channel Value
max.description: The maxmimum channel value over the observed period

mean.title: Mean Channel Value
mean.description: The mean channel value over the observed period

std.title: Standard Deviation Channel Value
std.description: The standard deviation channel value over the observed period

channelPropertyValueDate.title: Channel Value
channelPropertyValueDate.description: This is the single value for your channel

channelPropertyValueString.title: Channel Value
channelPropertyValueString.description: This is the single value for your channel

title: PBSHM Data Schema: Structure Data
description: A JSON Schema for Population-based Structural Health Monitoring Data

name.title: Structure Name
name.description: This should be a unique name for your structure within the population

population.title: Population Name
population.description: This should be the unique name for your Population of structures

timestamp.title: Data Timestamp
timestamp.description: This is the timestamp of when the data was recorded in ISO 8601 format

channels.title: Data Channel Array
channels.description: This is the array of channel data for this structure at the given timestamp

oneOf.title: Acceleration Channel
oneOf.description: This object should be used for when you are storing acceleration based channel data
